Title: Hopetown Grand Prix
MetaDescription: One of the coolest races of all was Hopetown - aka Corriganville - located on a Hollywood movie set in Simi Valley, California.
MetaKeyword: Hopetown, Motocross, Motorcycle Race, Simi Valley, Roger DeCoster, Joel Robert, Torsten Hallman, Fasthouse, Bob Hope, Crash Corrigan, Corriganville, Bruce Brown, Wide World of Sports
BrowserTitle: Fasthouse | When Rules Were Few | Hopetown Grand Prix

Category.Title: History
Category.Content:
Back in the day, motorcycle racing at Southern California’s great places and great races attracted the attention of the world. Deserts and mountains and city streets were open and inviting. But the era of “few rules and regulations” came to an end when over zealous environmentalist and sue happy people went on the attack. But nothing will ever erase those great days and the badasses who made it cool.
{{FeaturedArticles}}
Category.MetaDescription: Check out the legendary tracks, cool races, and American bad asses that made motorcycle racing so cool.
Category.MetaKeyword: Hopetown Grand Prix, Westlake Grand Prix, Elsinore Grand Prix, Mammoth Motocross, Day in the Dirt, Indian Dunes Motorcycle Park, Saddleback Motocross Park, Carlsbad Raceway, Bay Mare Motorcycle Park, Barstow to Vegas, J.N. Roberts, John DeSoto, John Rice, Danny Magoo, Boozefighters, Catalina Grand Prix

Title: Indian Dunes
MetaDescription: Indian Dunes featured two motocross tracks - the International and Shadow Glens. It was the place to be between 1970 and 1985 and produced many great legends. The question is: did you ever race at the Dunes?
MetaKeyword: Indian Dunes, Motocross, Valencia, Fasthouse, Shadow Glens, Johnny O'Mara, Jim Holley, Ernie Alexander, Kenny Alexander, Mouse McCoy, Willie Simons, Movie Set, Baa Baa Black Sheep, Hollywood
BrowserTitle: Fasthouse | When Rules Were Few | Indian Dunes Motocross Park

Title: Carlsbad Raceway
MetaDescription: Just up the coast from San Diego, to the west the Pacific pounded the surf, to the east the foothills paved a route to the world famous Carlsbad Raceway.
MetaKeyword: Carlsbad Raceway, Carlsbad California, Hang Ten Motocross Grand Prix, motocross, motorcycle racing, Rick Johnson, Brad Lackey, Marty Moates, world championship
